name: Go Home - Rage incoming
description: The goal of Go Home is to get home without dying.Sounds simple, if there wouldnt be a variety of enemies and traps, which will make it difficult for you to reach your home before the time runs out.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, 7 or 8 Processor: 1 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 26 MB available space

reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.  So someone made a tutorial on how to make a simple block maze game. Someone else took that tutorial, followed it, put it on steam and is charging money for it. Stealing is one thing, but taking someone else's work, putting your name on it and selling it is another.
